DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of that register is to collect medical information about patients suffering of APS with or without associated SLE.
DOC.brief_title: Register of Patients With Anti-Phospholipids Syndrome (APS) and/or Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE)
DOC.detailed_description: Recruitment of patients with APS and SLE treated. Retrospective and prospective register.
DOC.criteria: Patient with APS Patient with SLE Dependent person Hospitalized without consent and not protected by law Detainee
